channel.description: So, I made a track, and I’d like the community to listen to it. Honestly, I’m not sure what genre I’d identify this as, but some feedback and constructive criticism would be greatly appreciated! https://soundcloud.com/user948742171/chiefbc-time

item.title: Time - By ChiefBC
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Agreed. Once it gets going around half way through the song it’s very nice listening, it just felt like it took a while to get there. and then ended too soon.

To me it still felt like it was building to something at the end of the song; I was pretty much waiting for some mad drums and a banging bassline to be dropped in

All of that said I still like the song as it is, so liked and you now have a new follower on SC.

Read full topic

item.title: Time - By ChiefBC
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I like it, the off beat piano caught me by surprise but not in a bad way. I listened twice and I really like the sound you brought in at about :55. From that point to the end i like what you’ve done, kinda just wish it was longer but as is you’ve got a nice little track going on

Read full topic
